amendment.description: Amendment increases and decreases by $1,000,000 Operations & Maintenance, Defense-wide account which funds the Space-Available flights program and for the purpose of instructing the Department to provide Congress with an assessment of possible concerns or issues in expanding eligibility for the Space-A program to include caregivers and spouses when accompanying 100% disabled veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to increase and decrease by $1,000,000 Operations & Maintenance, Defense-wide account which funds the Space-Available flights program and for the purpose of instructing the Department to provide Congress with an assessment of possible concerns or issues in expanding eligibility for the Space-A program to include caregivers and spouses when accompanying 100% disabled veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A109) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 3 (Roll no. 352).

action.text: Amendment (A109) offered by Ms. Blunt Rochester.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A109) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 3 (Roll no. 352).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A109) offered by Ms. Blunt Rochester.
